name: Chat Server & Client
tagline: A chat server and client in Java
body: # Chat-Server-and-Client A chat server and client made in Java This was a school project by me and Mattias Edin for the course Data Communication and Datanet, taken at Ume√• University of Sweden. We developed a chat system, both width server and client, where the client have a graphical user interface. You can see the report, though sadly in swedish, in doirapport.pdf. # Server We developed our own pakages and sent them over TCP protocol, we used threads to keep up with multiple users. # Client Also implemented the TCP protocol and made it posible to set and change nickname and topic of a server.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
